reviewText:
If you played Withering Kingdom: Arcane War, you know exactly what you're in for. I don't mean you know what to expect, I'm saying this is THE EXACT SAME F*CKING GAME!

Wyatt Derp is the next storm in the sh*t storm coming from the kings of sh*tty developers, Digital Homicide Studios/Digital Homicide Studios LLC. or whatever the f*ck you want to be called now.

I know for a fact that this review is going to mirror my Withering Kingdom review, because they're both the same game FFS.

The controls are slippery, just like Krog Wars, just like WIthering Kingdom, when you press a key then let go, you bet that it will do it fr another second longer.

The gameplay is full of bugs that it makes the game ridiculously easy and boring.

However, one problem Wyatt Derp has that Withering Kingdom didn't is the animations. The animations that the main character do have no logic or sense attached to them eg: when you roll, the rolling animation is meant for when someone rolls forward, but Derp decides to live up to his name and roll sideways instead.

This game is c*cking b*llocks sh*t and is one of the worst DH did because they literraly didn't put any effort into this. They copy, pasted the code of either this or Withering Kingdom and put it onto the other and swapped the assets and improved f*ck all.

Pros
+ The quote If it ain't broke
date:
don't fix it" has a whole new meaning to me now

Cons
- THE SAME GAME = THE SAME CONS
- Bad animations

Final verdict: 1/10

P.S. yes this is my Wyatt Derp review copy and pasted but all Digital Homicide have done in Wyatt Derp 2 is change the camera angle of Wyatt Derp
recommended: so if Digital Homicide can release a game with just a simple camera change
hoursPlayed: I can add this little message in and call it a different review\n\nMy Steam Curator Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/MellowReviews"

reviewText:
This is an uninspired poorly coded, janky, horrifyingly bland asset flip of a game. As shwon in my video, this is one of multiple instances of Digital Homicide's re-skinning video games and re-selling them as new titles. Wyatt Derp and Wyatt Derp 2 are the exact same game with a camera angle change. It is also a reskin of Withering Kingdom and Withering Kingdom 2, along with Krog Wars. The conveyor belt of crap continues as they don't even bother to flip different assets. Why bother when you can simply slap another skin on it and sell it as a new game!

Seriously. Avoid this crap at all costs.

If you are interested in seeing what I'm talking about, see my report here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3h532IZSEQA
voteText: 82 of 86 people (95%) found this review helpful 3 people found this review funny

reviewText:
It's a typical example of Digital Homicide reusing its own projects and reselling them as new titles-- In this case, they changed nothing but the camera angle, top-down as opposed to behind the player in Wyatt Derp.

Nothing else has changed, not even the orientation of the text displays.

Nothing whatsoever.
